items.title: Agentic Document Processing: The Evolution Beyond Traditional IDP
items.content_html: The emergence of Agentic Document Processing (ADP) represents a fundamental architectural shift in how organizations approach document-centric automation. Unlike traditional Intelligent Document Processing (IDP), which operates as a passive extraction and classification layer, ADP introduces autonomous decision-making capabilities that can orchestrate complex workflows, leverage enterprise context, and adapt to evolving business requirements without explicit reprogramming.

items.title: ABBYY
items.content_html: ABBYY is a global provider of intelligent document processing, content AI, and language solutions. The company is known for its advanced OCR (Optical Character Recognition) technology and document capture solutions.

items.title: Box
items.content_html: Box is a leading cloud content management platform that enables organizations to securely manage, share, and collaborate on their content from anywhere, on any device, while maintaining enterprise-grade security and compliance.

items.title: Datamatics
items.content_html: Datamatics is a digital technology company providing intelligent document processing solutions through its TruCap+ platform.

items.title: Hyperscience
items.content_html: Hyperscience is a market leader in intelligent document processing and hyperautomation, leveraging advanced AI and machine learning technologies to transform how organizations handle complex documents and automate data extraction.

items.title: Infrrd
items.content_html: Infrrd provides AI-powered intelligent document processing solutions that enable organizations to extract data from complex documents and automate document-centric business processes.

items.title: Klippa (acquired by SER Group)
items.content_html: Klippa is a technology company specializing in intelligent document processing (IDP) and OCR solutions that automate data extraction from various document types. In 2025, Klippa was acquired by SER Group, a leading provider of intelligent content automation solutions.

items.title: Nanonets
items.content_html: [Nanonets]](https://nanonets.com/) is an AI-powered intelligent document processing and workflow automation cloud platform that leverages advanced OCR and machine learning to extract data from unstructured documents and automate document-intensive business processes.

items.title: Ocrolus
items.content_html: Ocrolus is a company that specializes in intelligent document processing and financial document analysis solutions. The company focuses on creating intelligent automation for document workflows.

items.title: TCG Process
items.content_html: TCG Process provides intelligent document processing and business process automation solutions that help organizations transform document-centric workflows through AI-powered technologies.

items.title: IDP-Software
items.content_html: Definitions Compiled from Multiple Sources

items.title: 4Semantics
items.content_html: 4Semantics is a Polish intelligent document processing provider that develops the SensID Cognitive Automation platform for automated document data extraction and workflow automation.

items.title: Adobe
items.content_html: Adobe is a company that specializes in intelligent document processing and creative software solutions. The company focuses on creating intelligent automation for document workflows.

items.title: AOTM
items.content_html: AOTM is an intelligent document processing platform developed by Ninestars that uses AI and machine learning for data extraction from business documents.

items.title: Ascron
items.content_html: Ascron is a Polish intelligent document processing provider specializing in legal services and debt collection management automation.

items.title: Automation Anywhere
items.content_html: Automation Anywhere is an AI-powered process automation platform provider offering RPA and intelligent document processing for enterprise automation at scale.

items.title: Botminds AI
items.content_html: Botminds AI is a no-code agentic AI platform provider offering intelligent document processing with proprietary AI algorithms and integrated document automation.

items.title: Captova Technologies
items.content_html: Captova Technologies provides high-speed intelligent document processing for secure and business environments with processing speeds exceeding 100 pages per second.

items.title: Cinnamon AI
items.content_html: Cinnamon AI is an enterprise AI company offering Flax Scanner, an AI-OCR platform for automated data extraction from unstructured documents without template definition.

items.title: ClearDox
items.content_html: ClearDox is an AI-powered commodities intelligence platform providing intelligent document processing and automation solutions for commodity trading operations.
